tool_description: Prices for more then 60 goods and services for more then 8000+ cities around the world from TravelTables.com
name: Cost of living and prices
title: Cost of living and prices

api_list.name: Cities
api_list.description: Get list of all the cities in the database with corresponding country name, id, lat and lng
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cost-of-living-and-prices.p.rapidapi.com/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cost-of-living-and-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cost-of-living-and-prices.p.rapidapi.com/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cost-of-living-and-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Prices
api_list.description: Prices for goods in services for city.  Require to specify city_name and country_name. Tip: See cities endpoint for list of cities and corresponding id, country_name, lat and lng.
